ClaimItem.name: ClaimItem
ClaimItem.description: Represents a defective asset that requires repair or replacement.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the claim.

AssetUsageUnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure for the usage value of the asset.

AssetUsageValue.description: The usage value for the asset at the time of occurrence of the fault.

ClaimId.description: The parent claim that includes this claim item.

FaultDate.description: The date of occurrence of the fault in the asset.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

RepairDate.description: The date of repair of the asset.
